entry: Got the idea and did some sketching in my notebook.

Started again with a new board. Soldered the red LEDs with their transistor, then the blue ones. Still didnâ€™t work because I wired the reds in series (8 of them ). Back to the drawing board.
Fixed the wiring properly. Everything checked out. Started coding after 5 hours of YouTube tutorials.
Finally got it working ---->>>>>>lets gooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo (Update: the board started smoking ðŸ’€)

Fixed the issue  , transistor was too weak and voltage was off. Replaced with a bigger one (an s8050) snd everything works. Only the web interface left, which I built with AI because I donâ€™t know HTML.(i did try to leanr it but my level is just toooo low for this project )
